remarks: An expression for the upper integers that start at ` N ` that is analogous to ~ dfnn2 for positive integers.  (Contributed by NM, 6-Jul-2005.)  (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2014.)
statement:
dfuzi.1 $e |- N e. ZZ $.
dfuzi $p |- { z e. ZZ | N <_ z } = |^| { x | ( N e. x /\ A. y e. x ( y + 1 ) e. x ) } $.
$d N x y z $.
